special_text:
[i](Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.)[/i]
When [i]Into the Heart of Nachtwood[/i] enters the battlefield, for each kind of counter on target permanent, put another counter of that kind on it or remove one from it.
{R}{G} Page 12
{T}, Remove a counter from an artifact or creature you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
{G}{W} Page 212
{T}, Remove three counters from among artifacts or creatures you control: Draw a card.
